name: Reprobel
membership: International Federation of Reproduction Rights Organisations (IFRRO)
goal: Reprobel is the Belgian central collective management organisation (CMO) for the collection and distribution of author & publisher remunerations rights in the field of reprography, education/research and public lending on the Belgian territory. Reprobel is cooperative company but with a non-for-profit goal and a legal collection monopoly. Reprobel is a full member of IFRRO.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Copyright (2001), collective rights management (2014) & DSM (upcoming) Directive
GDPR
